title: Ep. 82: Make a List (If You Want)
description:
Make a to-do list (if that works for you), buy that essential item every chance you get, and enlist the strategy of identity to form and break habits. Get in touch: @gretchenrubin; @elizabethcraft; podcast@gretchenrubin.com; happiercast.com/82; 774-277-9336. 
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
